page.title: 19Local sales outlets
page.content: There are 3 shops in Walgrave. The Co-op supermarket is a small general foodstore.They sell food,dairy products and general household goods.Three people work in the shop. Walgrave post office is an Aladdin's Cave - you can buy almost anything there - including school uniform. Kay Mains owns another general village store,especially popular with the children for the sweets she sells. There is also a smallholding selling eggs,plants and poultry.There is a garage with one pump. The Royal Oak public house is owned by Manns Brewery. There are no shops in Hannington, only the Oasis pub on the A.43 - and a farm selling produce.
